author: Tom Carreras, AI Boost
title: Lingerie Fighting Championships to Add $2M in Bitcoin to Treasury Ahead of Expansion to UK
description: The Las Vegas-based MMA league is embracing BTC ahead of its first events in England and Wales this July.
content:
The bitcoin treasury trend which has seen many firms globally adopting Michael Saylors strategy entered a new phase on Thursday.
